snippet: Ashton B. Carter relied on his personal account, which is against department rules, during his first few months on the job.
abstract: White House and Defense Department officials reveal Defense Secretary Ashton B Carter utilized his personal email account, in violation of Defense Department rules, during his first months at the Pentagon; email use of senior administration officials is closely watched after Hilary Clinton was found to have sent over 30,000 emails from her personal account while she was secretary of state.
